items.text: Over the past 3 years, I have dedicated myself to mastering the intricacies of Frontend development, and I am now eager to take the next step in my career journey in the dynamic field of IT. Driven by a passion for technology and innovation, I am particularly interested in internship and job opportunities where I can contribute meaningfully while continuing to grow and learn. My ultimate goal is to join a team of professionals where I can leverage my knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Angular, and further develop my abilities in a collaborative environment.
